select * from ( select rownum as rn, a.* from( select * from starboard where category = '병원' order by review_avg desc, hit desc ) a ) where rn >= 0 and rn <= 1
select * from ( select rownum as rn, a.* from( select * from starboard where category = '공원' order by review_avg desc, hit desc ) a ) where rn >= 0 and rn <= 1
